Title: Concentration-time profile for perhexiline and hydroxyperhexiline in patients at steady state.
Name: Perhexiline

Sentece: The plasma concentration of the cis-monohydroxyperhexiline (peak of 473 +/- 43 ng/ml at 7.5 +/- 2.0 h) was always higher than for unchanged perhexiline (peak of 112 +/- 20 ng/ml at 6.5 +/- 2.0 h) whereas the concentration of the transmetabolite was either low or undetectable in plasma.
Title: Further studies on the pharmacokinetics of perhexiline maleate in humans.
